title: Rays troll Yankees fans for boorish behavior at Yankee Stadium
body: Fans watch during the fourth inning of a baseball game between the New York Yankees and the Tampa Bay Rays on Friday, April 16, 2021, in New York.  fans didn’t have much to be happy about this weekend, with the  coming into town and sweeping a three-game series. New York woke up Monday morning with the (5-10).But that’s no excuse for the which played out Friday at . It came in the eighth inning of , when Of course, the Rays couldn’t let the disturbing scene pass without taking a shot or two at the Yankees faithful. According to the, Rays manager  wasn’t worried about his players getting hurt: “I didn’t see that many good arms, so I wasn’t overly concerned.”Tampa Bay outfielder  said he “had no idea what was going on. I (only) played one other game in Yankee Stadium before when I was with Kansas City. I didn’t know if that was like a ritual or something, when you’re losing by six runs you throw baseballs at the opposing team. I didn’t know if that’s what they do around here.”But that wasn’t all from Phillips, who jabbed the Yankees masses on, posting a video of him being showered by F-bombs with the caption, “Stay classy Yankee Fans.”Rays pitcher  called the scene a “fiasco”: “We were kind of wondering, ‘What the heck was going on.’ I’ve never seen anything like it. … They’re coming from all different angles so you just didn’t know where they’re coming from.”The Rays won’t have to wait too long to get another look at Yankees fans.
